definition: to set up a teammate (with an opportunity to score)/to throw a game

to do/to make/to produce/to write/to compose/to act as/to engage in/to hold (a party)/to be/to become/to function (in some capacity)/to serve as/to be used for/to form (a bond or relationship)/to pretend/to feign/to act a part/to put on appearance

sentences.english: The other team's right-midfielder fed the ball through to their striker.
sentences.chinese: 對方球隊的右中場給他們的前鋒做球。

definition: to knock on the door/to take a shot on goal (sports)
corner kick (in soccer)/free strike in hockey
(soccer, handball etc) to kick or shoot the ball towards the goal
to burst or force open a door/to excommunicate sb (from the Roman Catholic Church)/to score a goal (in football, hockey etc)
to receive a served ball (volleyball, tennis etc)/to catch a ball thrown by sb
middle period of a tripartite provincial exam (in former times)/midfield/mid-court (in sports)/half-time/intermission half-way through a performance
